statements: UPDATE FinancialRatios SET ratio_formula = 'Profit / Revenue', data_source = 'Internal Calculation' WHERE ratio_name = 'Profit Margin';
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET calculation_method = 'Manual Calculation', ratio_formula = 'Net Income / Total Assets' WHERE ratio_name = 'Return on Assets';
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET calculation_method = 'Formula A', data_source = 'Internal' WHERE ratio_name = 'Liquidity Ratio';
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET data_source = 'External', calculation_method = 'Formula B' WHERE ratio_name = 'Profit Margin';
UPDATE financial_ratios SET value = 1.25 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE performance_indicators SET value = 0.75 WHERE indicator_name = 'ROI'
UPDATE financial_ratios SET value = 0.75 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE performance_indicators SET value = 150.25 WHERE indicator_name = 'Net Profit Margin'
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET formula = 'New Formula', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PerformanceIndicators SET weight = 0.75, calculation_formula = 'Revised Formula' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET ratio_name = 'Debt to Equity Ratio', description = 'Measures a company’s debt level relative to its equity.' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PerformanceIndicators SET weight = 0.75, calculation_formula = 'Revenue Growth / Operating Income' WHERE indicator_name = 'Sales Growth'
UPDATE financial_ratios SET formula='New Formula', description='Updated Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE performance_indicators SET target_value=1500, baseline_value=1000 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE financial_ratios SET formula='new formula', description='Updated description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE performance_indicators SET target_value=200.50, baseline_value=150.75 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET current_assets = 25000, current_liabilities = 15000 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE LiquidityAnalysis SET quick_ratio = 1.5, current_ratio = 2.3 WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Inc';
UPDATE FinancialRatios SET current_assets = current_assets + 500, current_liabilities = current_liabilities - 200 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE EfficiencyIndicators SET receivables_turnover = 10.5, inventory_turnover = 6.8 WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Ltd';
